Bash(cd /c/Users/fabel/Documents/Ivoire_Node/SaaS/Trado && PYTHONIOENCODING=utf-8 .venv/Scripts/python.exe -c "
from config.settings import Settings
from trading.risk.manager import RiskManager
from trading.risk.circuit_breaker import CircuitBreaker
from trading.strategies.base import Signal

s = Settings\(\)

# --- Test CircuitBreaker : trailing stop portefeuille ---
cb = CircuitBreaker\(s\)
print\('=== CircuitBreaker ==='\)
cb.update\(10_250\)   # +2.5% -> active le trailing \(threshold=2%\)
print\(f'  Apres +2.5%   ptsl_active={cb._ptsl_active}  peak={cb._intraday_peak}'\)
result = cb.update\(10_250 * 0.979\)   # repli 2.1% -> stop declenche
print\(f'  Apres repli 2.1%  update={result}  paused={cb.is_paused}'\)

# --- Test RiskManager : filtre R/R ---
print\(\)
print\('=== Filtre R/R ==='\)
rm = RiskManager\(s\)
# R/R = 0.5 -> refuse
sig_bad = Signal\(action='BUY', symbol='BTC/USDT', confidence=0.8,
                 stop_loss=95_000, take_profit=102_500\)
ok = rm.validate_signal\(sig_bad, price=100_000\)
print\(f'  R/R=0.5  -> valide={ok}  \(attendu: False\)'\)
# R/R = 3.0 -> accepte
sig_ok = Signal\(action='BUY', symbol='BTC/USDT', confidence=0.8,
                stop_loss=96_000, take_profit=112_000\)
ok = rm.validate_signal\(sig_ok, price=100_000\)
print\(f'  R/R=3.0  -> valide={ok}  \(attendu: True\)'\)

# --- Test Trailing stop ---
print\(\)
print\('=== Trailing stop ==='\)
rm.record_open\('BTC/USDT', 'BUY', 0.1, 100_000, stop_loss=98_000\)
print\(f'  Stop initial={rm._trailing_stops[\\"BTC/USDT\\"]}  activation={rm._trailing_activation[\\"BTC/USDT\\"]}'\)
rm.update_trailing_stops\({'BTC/USDT': 101_000}\)
print\(f'  A 101000: stop={rm._trailing_stops[\\"BTC/USDT\\"]:.2f}'\)
triggered = rm.update_trailing_stops\({'BTC/USDT': rm._trailing_stops['BTC/USDT'] - 10}\)
print\(f'  Repli sous stop: triggered={triggered}'\)

# --- Test Livermore ---
print\(\)
print\('=== Livermore ==='\)
rm2 = RiskManager\(s\)
sig = Signal\(action='BUY', symbol='ETH/USDT', confidence=0.85,
             stop_loss=3_000, take_profit=4_500, size=1.0,
             strategy='test', entry_price=3_500\)
sig = rm2.open_livermore_signal\(sig\)
print\(f'  Taille initiale \(1/3\): {sig.size}  \(attendu ~0.33\)'\)
next_add = rm2._livermore_targets['ETH/USDT']['next_add_price']
print\(f'  Next add price: {next_add:.1f}  \(attendu 3517.5\)'\)
reinforce = rm2.check_livermore_add\('ETH/USDT', 3_518\)
print\(f'  Renforcement a 3518: {\\"Signal\\" if reinforce else \\"None\\"}  size={reinforce.size if reinforce else \\"N/A\\"}'\)
print\(\)
print\('BATCH 1 OK'\)
" 2>&1)

import numpy as np

# === Test 1 : BBands fix ===
print\('=== Test BBands fix ==='\)
import pandas as pd
from analysis.technical.indicators import TechnicalIndicators

np.random.seed\(42\)
n = 250
closes = 40000 + np.cumsum\(np.random.randn\(n\) * 200\)
df = pd.DataFrame\({
    'open': closes - 50, 'high': closes + 100,
    'low':  closes - 100, 'close': closes, 'volume': np.ones\(n\) * 1000
}\)
result = TechnicalIndicators.add_all\(df\)
assert 'bb_upper' in result.columns, 'bb_upper manquant'
assert 'bb_pct' in result.columns, 'bb_pct manquant'
print\(f'  bb_upper, bb_pct : OK  \(bb_pct last={result[\\"bb_pct\\"].iloc[-1]:.3f}\)'\)

# === Test 2 : set_dropout ===
print\(\)
print\('=== Test set_dropout ==='\)
import torch
from models.tft.architecture import TemporalFusionTransformer
from models.lstm.architecture import LSTMModel

tft = TemporalFusionTransformer\(input_size=12\)
tft.set_dropout\(0.35\)
drops = [m.p for m in tft.modules\(\) if isinstance\(m, torch.nn.Dropout\)]
print\(f'  TFT dropouts apres set_dropout\(0.35\): {set\(drops\)}  \(attendu {{0.35}}\)'\)

lstm = LSTMModel\(input_size=12\)
lstm.set_dropout\(0.4\)
print\(f'  LSTM dropout apres set_dropout\(0.4\): {lstm.dropout.p}  \(attendu 0.4\)'\)

# === Test 3 : Early stopping \(simule overfitting\) ===
print\(\)
print\('=== Test Early stopping TFT ==='\)
from models.tft.trainer import TFTTrainer

trainer = TFTTrainer\(input_size=12, epochs=30, batch_size=8\)
X_tr  = np.random.randn\(200, 60, 12\).astype\(np.float32\)
y_tr  = np.random.randint\(0, 3, 200\)
X_val = np.random.randn\(40, 60, 12\).astype\(np.float32\)
y_val = np.random.randint\(0, 3, 40\)
trainer.fit\(X_tr, y_tr, X_val, y_val, patience=3\)  # patience courte pour test rapide
print\('  fit\(\) avec early stopping : OK'\)

# === Test 4 : CPO ===
print\(\)
print\('=== Test CPO SignalFusion ==='\)
from analysis.aggregator.signal_fusion import SignalFusion

sf = SignalFusion\(\)
# Marché volatile \(atr_ratio=2.5\) -> tech penalise, sentiment booste
fused_cpo = sf.fuse\(0.5, 0.3, 0.4, 0.1, regime='trend_up',
                    market_context={'atr_ratio': 2.5, 'volume_ratio': 1.0, 'adx': 20.0}\)
fused_base = sf.fuse\(0.5, 0.3, 0.4, 0.1, regime='trend_up'\)
print\(f'  Sans CPO  : tech={fused_base.weights_used[\\"tech\\"]:.3f}  sent={fused_base.weights_used[\\"sentiment\\"]:.3f}'\)
print\(f'  Avec CPO  : tech={fused_cpo.weights_used[\\"tech\\"]:.3f}  sent={fused_cpo.weights_used[\\"sentiment\\"]:.3f}'\)
assert fused_cpo.weights_used['tech'] < fused_base.weights_used['tech'], 'tech devrait diminuer en volatilite'
assert fused_cpo.weights_used['sentiment'] > fused_base.weights_used['sentiment'], 'sentiment devrait augmenter'
print\(f'  CPO adjustments: {fused_cpo.metadata}'\)

# === Test 5 : PoP filter ===
print\(\)
print\('=== Test ProbabilityOfProfitFilter ==='\)
from analysis.corrective.pop_filter import ProbabilityOfProfitFilter
from analysis.aggregator.signal_fusion import Decision, FusedSignal

pf = ProbabilityOfProfitFilter\(min_pop=0.50\)

# Signal fort et aligne en trend_up -> PoP elevee
strong_fused = FusedSignal\(
    decision=Decision.BUY, score=0.65, confidence=0.65,
    tech_score=0.6, ai_score=0.7, sentiment_score=0.5, ob_imbalance=0.2,
    regime='trend_up'
\)
allowed, pop = pf.should_trade\(strong_fused, {'atr_ratio': 1.0}\)
print\(f'  Signal fort aligne trend_up : allowed={allowed}  PoP={pop:.3f}  \(attendu: True\)'\)

# Signal faible en regime oppose -> PoP basse
weak_fused = FusedSignal\(
    decision=Decision.BUY, score=0.22, confidence=0.22,
    tech_score=-0.3, ai_score=0.5, sentiment_score=-0.2, ob_imbalance=0.1,
    regime='trend_down'  # BUY contre une tendance baissiere
\)
allowed2, pop2 = pf.should_trade\(weak_fused, {'atr_ratio': 2.0}\)
print\(f'  Signal faible contre-tendance : allowed={allowed2}  PoP={pop2:.3f}  \(attendu: False\)'\)

print\(\)
print\('BATCH 2 OK'\)
" 2>&1)

from backtest.engine import adaptive_slippage, COMMISSION_PCT
# Test adaptive_slippage
s1 = adaptive_slippage\(50000, 1000, 5000, 100000\)  # BTC normal
s2 = adaptive_slippage\(50000, 2500, 5000, 100000\)  # forte volatilité \(ATR = 5%\)
s3 = adaptive_slippage\(50000, 1000, 5000, 10000\)   # impact élevé \(50% du volume\)
print\(f'COMMISSION_PCT = {COMMISSION_PCT}'\)
print\(f'Slippage normal      : {s1:.6f} \({s1*100:.4f}%\)'\)
print\(f'Slippage haute vol   : {s2:.6f} \({s2*100:.4f}%\)'\)
print\(f'Slippage haute impact: {s3:.6f} \({s3*100:.4f}%\)'\)
assert s2 > s1, 'haute vol doit augmenter le slippage'
assert s3 > s1, 'haute impact doit augmenter le slippage'
print\('OK adaptive_slippage'\)
")

Bash(cd /c/Users/fabel/Documents/Ivoire_Node/SaaS/Trado && .venv/Scripts/python.exe -c "
from backtest.engine import adaptive_slippage, COMMISSION_PCT

# ordre atomique \(<0.5% du volume\) → impact_mult=1.0
s_low  = adaptive_slippage\(50000, 1000, 100, 100000\)     # 0.1% du volume
# ordre notable \(0.5-2%\) → impact_mult=2.0
s_mid  = adaptive_slippage\(50000, 1000, 1000, 100000\)    # 1% du volume
# gros ordre \(>2%\) → impact_mult=3.0
s_high = adaptive_slippage\(50000, 1000, 5000, 100000\)    # 5% du volume
# haute volatilité \(ATR=5% du close\) → vol_mult=2.0
s_vol  = adaptive_slippage\(50000, 2500, 100, 100000\)     # ATR=5%, ordre atomique

print\(f'Slippage faible impact : {s_low:.5f} \({s_low*100:.3f}%\)'\)
print\(f'Slippage impact moyen  : {s_mid:.5f} \({s_mid*100:.3f}%\)'\)
print\(f'Slippage fort impact   : {s_high:.5f} \({s_high*100:.3f}%\)'\)
print\(f'Slippage haute vol     : {s_vol:.5f} \({s_vol*100:.3f}%\)'\)

assert s_mid > s_low,  'mid impact > low impact'
assert s_high > s_mid, 'high impact > mid impact'
assert s_vol  > s_low, 'high vol > base vol'
print\('OK adaptive_slippage — tous les paliers fonctionnent'\)
")

Bash(cd /c/Users/fabel/Documents/Ivoire_Node/SaaS/Trado && .venv/Scripts/python.exe -c "
import asyncio
from data.pipeline.trade_journal import init_async, record_closed_trade, record_snapshot, load_snapshots, load_trades

async def test\(\):
    await init_async\(\)
    await record_snapshot\(10100.0, 1\)
    await record_snapshot\(10250.0, 2\)
    await record_closed_trade\('BTC/USDT', 'BUY', 65000.0, 66000.0, 0.1, 100.0, 'ema_rsi'\)
    snaps  = load_snapshots\(10\)
    trades = load_trades\(10\)
    print\('Snapshots:', [\(s['value'], s['positions']\) for s in snaps]\)
    print\('Trades:', [\(t['symbol'], t['pnl']\) for t in trades]\)
    assert len\(snaps\)  == 2
    assert len\(trades\) == 1
    assert trades[0]['pnl'] == 100.0
    print\('OK trade_journal async + sync'\)

asyncio.run\(test\(\)\)
")

con = sqlite3.connect\('data/cache/trado_journal.db'\)
con.execute\('DELETE FROM portfolio_snapshots'\)
con.execute\('DELETE FROM closed_trades'\)
con.execute\('DELETE FROM sqlite_sequence WHERE name IN \(\\"portfolio_snapshots\\", \\"closed_trades\\"\)'\)
con.commit\(\)
con.close\(\)
print\('DB nettoyee'\)
")

with open\('pyproject.toml', 'rb'\) as f:
    data = tomllib.load\(f\)
deps = data['project']['dependencies']
# Ecrire requirements.txt
with open\('requirements.txt', 'w', encoding='utf-8'\) as f:
    f.write\('# requirements.txt — genere depuis pyproject.toml\\n'\)
    f.write\('# Utilise par launcher.py au premier demarrage\\n\\n'\)
    for d in deps:
        f.write\(d + '\\n'\)
print\('requirements.txt genere :', len\(deps\), 'packages'\)
")
